ygData.subject: Arrival
ygData.msgSnippet: Lunarpine was confused, he hadn t thought about the chain of command. We shouldn t have to worry about the chain of command, Ramulus and a few others already

Lunarpine was confused, he hadn't thought about the chain of command. "We
shouldn't have to worry about the chain of command, Ramulus and a few others
already know that I've changed bodies." he already had that advantage. "The
only problem we might have would be if the CF recognized your DNA sequence."
the wolf thought about the problems they might have, the scanners could
possably recognize the owl DNA. Or it might even scan Dinobots DNA in Razor
Claw. there would be quite a bit of explaining to do if anyonev started
asking questions.

Razor Claw sat up straight when adressed by Ice, "Chief of Security is a
fine cover mam." he was there to follow her orders as Veratis had
instructed. He wasn't comfortable using her name yet, at least not in this
type of situation.

Lunarpine recieves the clearance to land so they land.(Logo posted the
landing already.)

The pods door opens and the three bots emerge. Lunarpine first, Then Ice,
and Razor Claw comes last. "Lunarpine, Reporting for the meeting as
requested, this is Ice and Razor Claw. May we be directed to the meeting?"
he was more nervous now then when he landed. "Watch yourself Wing, we're not
out of trouble yet." he thought to her reaffirming her suspicions that
things wouldn't be as easy as it seemed.

"I'm looking out for us all Dearheart" Ice returned the thoughts and
confirmed that she wasn't taking this lightly.


----- Original Message -----
From: <logomorph@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Friday, December 01, 2000 9:47 AM
Subject: Re: Sorry logo I gotta go.


> Ice::
>
> She smiled nervousely.  She looked to him. "You will be my second in
> command.  Your my First Officer. Or is there another title that you
> want?"
>
> She wasn't sure about command ranks. She was trying to get the storys
> for them set up so it all flowed when they met the maximals.
>
>
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > Razor Claw observed the nature of the exchange between the two. He
> > saw Ice put Lunarpine back in place with her orders. He would
> > remember the wolfbot for trying to make her lose face. It was clear
> > to him that Lunarpine seemed resentful at her being named as the
> > leader.
> >
> > Lunarpine scanned all frequencies waiting for a response. "Keep it
> up
> > Ice." He thought, sort of his way of saying congratulations on your
> > first command.
> >
> > --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> > > Ice::
> > > She smiled at him calling her boss. She thought that she could
> get
> > > used to that.   "Thank you Lunarpine."
> > >
> > > She angled the pod in possition to land.
> > >
> > >
> > > --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > > > Lunarpine snapped back up in his seat as a show for Razor
> > > Claw. "You
> > > > got it boss." He swung around in his seat and faced the console.
> > > >
> > > > "Cybertronian Fire, this is Lunarpine in the transport pod
> > > aproaching
> > > > from the north, I have two bots and myself requesting landing
> > > > clearance." his face showed as little emotion as possible but
> he
> > > > fealt good to be returning.
> > > >
>
>
>
